title: CLI Tooling for Framework Self-Improvement
description: Enhance the AI Lab Framework's self-improvement capabilities by providing clear CLI workflows and tutorials for using CLI tools (like gemini-cli or opencode) to modify, extend, and track work within the framework itself. This initiative aims to make the framework easier to manage and evolve through command-line interfaces.
acceptance_criteria: Comprehensive CLI documentation for framework self-modification is available.
CLI commands/scripts exist for common framework self-modification tasks (e.g., creating new work items, updating project status, generating documentation).
Integration examples for gemini-cli and opencode are provided.
Framework can be effectively managed and evolved using CLI tools.
notes: This work item is crucial for enabling AI agents and developers to interact with and improve the framework more efficiently via CLI.
